description: couple engaged in intercourse; young woman struggles, attempting to push away from man; woman wears purple kimono with white flowers; man wears red and pink checked kimono; pink and red shamisen on top of an open book resting on a black and pink chest in URQ; text below center on left edge
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Shamisen Instructor, No. 2 from Twelve Bouts in the Way of Love (Shikidō torikumi jūniban)
